story.storykicker: Actor Amal Sehrawat, who played Sangram Singh in Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, will play a gay character in a short film titled Gay Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai.
story.storybody:
Actor Amal Sehrawat, known as Sangram Singh of popular soap opera Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, will next portray a gay character for an upcoming short film titled Gay Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai.

In the special video, Amal will be joined by his Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai co-star Alok Nath.

"My character's name is Vimlesh in the film and Alok Nath is playing my father-in-law. This film has a positive message on gay marriage. The film takes a dig at what obstacles are faced during gay marriages in India. It has been told in a very entertaining and refreshing manner.

Asked about his opinion on gay rights in the country, Amal said: "We have over-hyped the whole issue. In India, sex is still a taboo. Physical intimacy and sexual preference are two different things.

"What is important is the inner feeling. I know so many wonderful people who have different sexual preferences."

The short film will be released on the YouTube channel Nazar Battu Productions on Friday.
story.magazinekicker: Actor Amal Sehrawat, who played Sangram Singh in Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, will play a gay character in a short film titled Gay Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai.
